mapper.select: SELECT TF.TOGFOOD_ID AS togetherFoodId, TF.TOG_ID AS togetherId, TF.FOOD_ID AS foodId, TF.QUANTITY AS quantity, F.FOOD_NAME AS "food.name", F.FOOD_PRICE AS "food.price" FROM TOGETHER_FOOD TF, FOOD F WHERE TF.FOOD_ID = F.FOOD_ID AND TOG_ID = #{togId} ORDER BY TOGFOOD_ID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TOGETHER_FOOD (TOGFOOD_ID, TOG_ID, FOOD_ID, QUANTITY) VALUES(TOGFOOD_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{togetherId}, #{foodId}, #{quantity})
mapper.update: UPDATE TOGETHER_FOOD SET TOGFOOD_ID = #{togetherFoodId}, TOG_ID = #{togetherId}, FOOD_ID = #{foodId}, QUANTITY = #{quantity}, WHERE TOG_ID = #{togetherId}
